Ingredients.1: 2 (3 pound) whole chickens, each cut into 8 pieces

Ingredients.2: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.6: 1 large green bell pepper, seeded and chopped

Ingredients.10: 1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes in juice, coarsely chopped

Directions.1: Season the chicken pieces with salt and black pepper.

Directions.2: Place the flour in a shallow bowl. Press each chicken piece into the flour and tap off excess.

Directions.3: Heat the olive oil in a large Dutch oven over medium heat until almost smoking hot.

Directions.4: Pan-fry the chicken until golden brown on both sides, about 3 minutes per side. Work in batches so as to not overcrowd the pan. Set the browned chicken aside.

Directions.5: Stir the onion, green bell pepper, and garlic into the Dutch oven; cook, stirring occasionally, until tender, about 5 minutes.

Directions.6: Stir in the mushroom; cook until they release their juice, 5 to 8 more minutes.

Directions.7: Mix in oregano, tomatoes, tomato paste, white wine, and chicken stock; bring to a boil.

Directions.8: Return the chicken pieces to the sauce, cover the pan, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until the chicken is no longer pink inside and the juices run clear, 30 to 40 minutes.

Directions.9: Stir in capers and sprinkle with basil to serve.
